creator: pierre42d@9online.fr
text:
[...]
performing libtool configuration...
using jlibtool

Check for compiler flags...
checking for malloc in -lefence... no
configure: error: Electric Fence requested but not detected


I have Electric Fence installed.

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
It looks like we need to add the pthreads CFLAGS when trying to compile the
efence test file.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Done.  Workaround is simply to pass LIBS=-lefence to configure so I'm not going
to backport this.

Thanks for the report.
